title: [K-12] Self-Directed Language Learning Competency Enhancement in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A corporate training program requiring the integration of real-time interaction and self-directed learning elements in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans at least three times per week using interactive materials provided on a mobile platform within one week.
Learners can complete one language project through collaboration with peers via a peer review system and submit it according to evaluation criteria.
Learners can perform self-assessment and feedback at least twice per week using digital learning tools (quizzes, recording features, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
